task.en:
Please help me write the following contents as a note in the Notes app titled "Road Trip Checklists". Use Notes' built-in checklist bullet points.
```
Tech
- Camera
- USB

Personal items
- Sunscreen
- Hair brush
```
task.zh:
请帮我在Notes软件中创建一个新的备忘录，标题叫做Road Trip Checklists，并把下面的内容放进去。把bullet points改成备忘录中的checklist格式。
```
Tech
- Camera
- USB

Personal items
- Sunscreen
- Hair brush
```
task.ar:
يرجى مساعدتي في كتابة المحتوى التالي كملاحظة في تطبيق Notes بعنوان "Road Trip Checklists". استخدم النقاط المدمجة لتنسيق القوائم.
```
Tech
- Camera
- USB

Personal items
- Sunscreen
- Hair brush
```
task.ja:
NotesアプリでRoad Trip Checklistsというタイトルの新しいメモを作成してください。内容を内蔵のチェックリストの箇条書き形式で入力してください。
```
Tech
- Camera
- USB

Personal items
- Sunscreen
- Hair brush
```
task.ru:
Создайте новую заметку в приложении Notes под названием Road Trip Checklists. Используйте встроенные чек-листы приложения Notes.
```
Tech
- Camera
- USB

Personal items
- Sunscreen
- Hair brush
```

pre_command: defaults write com.apple.Notes windowStateArchive -dict-add currentNoteContainerViewMode 0 && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to make new note with properties {name:"Lorem Ipsum", body:"Dolor Sit Amet"}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note' -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note in folder "Recently Deleted"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to quit'
grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -A20 "<div><h1>Travel Essentials" | grep -A20 "<div>Tech" | grep -A20 "<li>Camera" | grep -A20 "<li>USB" | grep -A20 "<div>Personal Items" | grep -A20 "<li>Sunscreen" | grep -A20 "<li>Hair brush" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -A20 "Travel Essentials" | grep -A20 "Tech" | grep -A20 "Camera" | grep -A20 "USB" | grep -A20 "Personal Items" | grep -A20 "Sunscreen" | grep -A20 "Hair brush" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"
